backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, user profiles, app data storage, and data models for dates, payments, monetary events, travel entries, travellers, and incomes.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature requests to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-written summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component that handles authentication state and conditionally displays profile setup or the ledger page.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header showing branding, sync status, and logout controls with cache and storage clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper that displays a login screen until an Internet Identity session is active.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable component that displays an icon or illustration with title, description, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting first-time users to enter and save their name with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper adding horizontal scroll support for table content using a ScrollArea.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Visual indicator showing sync, success, or failure states with optional time‑ago display.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: UI panel to export ledger state to a JSON backup and restore data with confirmation when drafts exist.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages car expense entry, auto-toll settings, and computes category totals within a date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form for adding a cash payment for a traveller with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Password‑protected panel allowing selective or full clearing of ledger data with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CoTraveller: Dialog for adding or editing other co‑traveller income entries with date, amount, and note fields.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a grid for marking daily AM/PM trips per traveller, with weekend inclusion toggles and save actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Provides a date-range selector using popover calendars, supporting controlled or context-driven state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and showing a toast on success.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a traveller's cash payment with success toast.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteTripH: Dialog confirming deletion of a trip history entry, optionally clearing AM/PM data for travellers.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Form dialog to edit car expense details with validation and update callbacks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Form dialog to edit a cash payment's amount, date, and note with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditTripHis: Dialog allowing AM/PM trip toggles for a traveller on a specific date with update handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Dialog wrapper displaying the expense history view for the selected date range.
Displays and filters car expenses by date, category, and search, with options to edit or delete entries.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Provides a button that opens the report export dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog for exporting ledger reports with selectable formats, report types, and detailed filter options.
Main ledger page managing tabs, dialogs, date ranges, and syncing while rendering all major ledger panels.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context wrapper exposing ledger state and mutation functions from useLedgerLocalState.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sidebar menu for navigating ledger tabs and opening payment, expense, and export dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form to add a new 'other pending' amount for a traveller with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallMont: Month/year selector that derives range classification and updates ledger date range accordingly.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Displays total income, expenses, profit/loss, and monthly breakdown computed from daily data and car expenses.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Dialog wrapper that shows the payment history view within a scrollable modal.
Shows filtered cash payments with traveller filter, table display, and edit/delete controls.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentSumm: Computes per-traveller dues, payments, and balances along with co-traveller income totals for the selected range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control for updating the trip rate with validation and formatted display.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Generates per-traveller weekday/weekend trip counts, charges, payments, and balances with forms for adding payments and pending amounts.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: UI component to add, rename, and remove travellers, blocking deletion if they have outstanding balances. Uses ledger state and balance calculations to manage the traveller list.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripHistory: Builds and displays trip history entries for travellers and co-travellers within a date range, with editing and deletion dialogs. Computes totals and handles sorting and filtering logic.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripsPaymen: Dropdown component allowing users to pick a year from a generated range for trip payment views. Triggers a callback when the selected year changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes. Supports anonymous and authenticated modes with access initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Synchronizes local ledger state with remote backend data using polling and debounced saves, merging changes safely and tracking sync status. Manages versioning, hashing, and conflict resolution.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages auto-toll configuration stored in localStorage, allowing toggling and updating of the toll amount. Persists settings automatically on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, loading stored identities and handling login/logout flows. Wraps AuthClient with custom initialization and exposes identity status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Manages local ledger state with React hooks, including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, and persistence to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS variables, themes, and base styling including tables and background colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
Generates monthly income/expense reports and profit/loss calculations from ledger data.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Handles exporting, importing, validating, and merging backup JSON for ledger state.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Provides date utilities for ranges, formatting, weekdays, and classifying month/year spans.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Exports ledger data to CSV files including daily grids and summary calculations.
frontend/src/utils/exportPdf.ts: Routes export requests to various PDF generators and builds an HTML-based standard report with traveller filtering and date-driven summaries.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Generates CSV exports for ledger data using filters, building daily grids, summaries, and metadata before triggering download.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes a traveller’s trip count, charges, payments, and balance within a date range, including optional pending amounts.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides INR currency formatting and parsing helpers.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates total and monthly income based on trip data and weekend rules, including co-traveller income adjustments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-route compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines whether dates, including weekends, should be included or editable based on settings and saved trip data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom fonts, color variables, layout settings, animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state for date‑range filtering features, tracking requirements, new feature requests, and architectural notes for Carpool Ledger.
